thread.title: Fumic and Avancini continue Cape Epic dominance with stage 2 win

title: Fumic and Avancini continue Cape Epic dominance with stage 2 win
text:
Fumic and Avancini continue Cape Epic dominance with stage 2 win Tuesday, March 20, 2018 - 01:30 
The pairing of Germany's Manuel Fumic and Brazilian Henrique Avancini was too good again in the Cape Epic mountain biking, with another win in stage two ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
The pairing of Germany's Manuel Fumic and Brazilian Henrique Avancini was too good again in the Cape Epic mountain biking, with another win in stage two Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2IIwo60
